body: @ebrevdo so I've set both `inter_op_parallelism_threads=1, intra_op_parallelism_threads=1` in `tf.ConfigProto`, but I am still having the same problem. Just to be clear: [here](https://github.com/standy66/tf_ctc_loss_unstable/blob/master/tf_ctc_loss_unstable.ipynb) is the notebook I'm running. I believe that plots in `In [5], In [6]` should be the same as `In [3], In [4]`, but they are not.
